message:
Thanks, this got the leaflet map working. and updated the linked md and Rmd files above. I did run into one puzzling issue where the Blog header and post title font sizes are downsized (screenshots attached) when I render in Jekyll. I'm guessing the leaflet CSS may be interfering with the particular CSS I am using on my site.
![](https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/f40637f2aaf341b544fe01c5b20c5db3f0a6c88e7254dd08884f41308d0d496b.png)
